channel.title: [317] Divine Syndicate V2 | Finished Release | ErasedPkz | Quests | Pking | Skil
channel.description:
[size=14pt][b]To see pictures etc check out: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,644328.0.html Few things has changed example: Barrow models has been replaced to the old models because people didnt like it. [/b][/size]
I have promised some people to get a v2 with the most bugs fixed and then re-release with them fixed and some new cool features. So here is a list i have made of the things i had fixed:
Server Progession:
- New Commmands: kdr/killratio/Tempmod/Tempadmin/Tempban/Tempmute/Checkbank/Relooaddrops/Reloadnpc/Reloaditems/Reloadshops - Empty in wilderness has been disabled - Made my own Configuration(Client) & Commands Class (Server) - Made my own MysteryBox with an 2 int array - Thanks to the help on Rune-Server.org! - Cannot trade in Wilderness anymore. - Added a Anti-spam system 7 > Is warning 9 = Muted. - Finished the Quest Tab WITH clickingbuttons added to it, Shouting Kdr etc. - Fixed Bones on Altar > Gives more Experience than Burying + Bones on Altar is using now the right Gfx & Animation. - Added a command ::price (itemid) (newprice) - This changes the shop price of the item. Thanks to Jason <3 - Added RuneScape Fading, thanks to a Rune-Server snippet idk wich one anymore. - I made so you can "Transform" your Sacred Clay armour if not wearing it to Mage, Range or Melee Armour. - Completed the real RuneScape dagganoths cave (Water Birth Island) To enter cave to Dagganoths. Thanks to Rune-Server<3 - All Homes Added Shops - Edited Majority of home shops (still need to do the rest) - Clipped following has been added succesfully! - Warriors guild now drops defenders, Dragon defender has been added to! - Fixed the clan chat bug that when u log out and log back in and join the chat your account is double. - Clan chat text has been edited, its now like it supposed to be - New shops: Donator=Party Pete(Npcid: 659)(Shopid: 26) & Vote Points=(27). - sendOption3 in dialogueHandler is now sucesfully working! - Npc made for Vote Handling(npcId: 807). He opens the shop, exchange vote for donatorPoint(1:5) or opens the vote page! - Finished the quest "The sleepless Dwarf". - Made a better attack distance for Npc's like real RS followed this little snippet: [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/507268-better-attack-distance-like-rs-npcs.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/507268-better-attack-distance-like-rs-npcs.html[/url] - Run/Sprint orb in the client has been fixed. - Added Slayer points + made Duradel(npcId: 8275) Tradable, opens(shopId 48), the slayer shop. - Pvp artefacts created, also it randomly drops an artefact if you kill someone. - 1Million Coins to reset any stats at the (npcId 6138) 2.5Million Coins for Reset All Stats. - Donators are free. - PkPoint shop has been added(npcId: 8762). Has a first and second shop. - Tokkul shops has been created, accepting Tokkul instead of Coins/Gp & Items has been added. - Experience Lamp has been added, new interface stolen from Deathlypvpz.(itemId: 2528) - Experience lamp is fully working, no bugs, no spam clicking.(itemId: 2528) - Experience lamp: Every other Experience rate is getting diffrent exp From Easy to Impossible: 2.5, 2, 1.5, 1 - Special Restores has been made, if in wild it gives only 25% special if not in wild it gives 50%. DONATORS ONLY! - Fixed the point shops, i forgot to add them to the method: handleOtherShops.. Im so stupid, found out myself later. - FINALLY Fixed the Tokkul shops, fully working now. - Added Npc Get Block animation Method, Was not added into server. Fixing all Npc animations percise. But getting t2 errors when Character blocks - Client side - Added alot Npc Attack & Block models. Still need to add more because Jad is crashing the client sometimes. - RFD Minigame Has been finished. - Fixed 2 Dupes, thanks to the Rsps Community & Rune-Server! - Trading has been fixed > When trading coins and click on Trade 5 it doesnt dissapear from your inventory anymore. - My own Loyalty System has been added: [Mod], [Admin], [$], [$$] & [$$$] - If you buy an item from the store and sell back again u get only get 75% of the price u bought it for, thanks to Rune-Server community<3 - Added New And Advances Frost Dragon Area - Should add a Npc shop for it just a thought. Portal Also Requires 80+ Dung to enter - Added Spawns: Port Sarim, Ice Dungeon, Lumbridge Swamp, Varrock Sewer & Correct Duel Spawns. - New CommandsLog system, Making diffrent txt files for Staffs, Donators & Players. - Using Magic Potion(1/4) on a Amulet of Glory will make the Amulet of Glory to a (1/4) and you will be able to teleport.
Client Progress: - Client: Dungeoneering whas in the skill spot of Hunter. Fixed the sprites + text. - Client: Not everyone likes the bright items so i have put them back to original. - Added Npc Get Block animation Method, Was not added into server. Fixing all Npc animations percise. But getting t2 errors when Character blocks - Client side
Still to add:
Bugs found by people who use Divine Syndicate source:
1- slayer tower i went to slayer, and when i got there. i went up the chain. but it clicked it twice. and when it did. it sent me to top floor. instead of second floor.
2- clue scroll Some of the clue scrolls. As you open them, it just shows teleport places. Completely covers whole clue. - DELETE THE CLUE SCROLLS LATER
3- zombie invasion As i was doing the quest. i did everything. but when i started killing the Zombie champion. i noticed, the way he moves seems glitched. also the place where he is. im not sure if its suppose to be all black, but it was black and all i could see were where doors were at and then zombie cha
- The cave of the Frost dragons, delete them and add Ice Giants and Alex makes a cave for the Frost Dragons.
- Make diffrent Experience for Killing npcs etc.
- Make it if you buy items from a store ex: Home teletab for (1kGP) and if you wanna sell it back u get only 75% of the amount u bought it for.
- Make Staff of Light special + special bar. Already tryed to add it but for some reason it doesnt show..
- Make the Flasks mixing to (6)..HOW THE **** WOULD I DO THAT WITHOUT GETTING PROBLEMS WITH THE OLD POTS??
- Make so your account doesnt log out directly but after 10 seconds of clicking "Log Out"
- Make Overload & Extrmee Potions Noted
- Fix Combat(40$)??? - Gabbe on skype
- Increase the server stability (15$)??? - James on skype
- Add and Re edit Npc Emotes Attack/Block/Death Etc..
- Tweak and fix Prices and Global Drops
- Need to fix Jad Animations- Crashing client [/spoiler]
Thanks to everyone that have reported bugs & helped me to fix them, i really like the Rune-Server community and i have alot of respect for everyone here. I know this wont be the best release here on Rune-Server but its just that im giving this out of respect and i allow everyone to use this and re-release it. Have alot of fun using this and there wont be a v3 guys, this is the real end for me now ^^.
I have decided to make a package now because its just easyer ^^. Package: http://uppit.com/balk67zaof0a/Divine_Syndicatev2.zip
[b]Credits:[/b] ErasedPkz - The base i used for this. InsidiaX - For the combat, Pk Skill & Some other things. Deathlypvpz - For the FunPK Location and a interface i forgot wich one. Mark (Paradox)- A Friend that helped me out alot and gave me tips and really spend time on me to get me more in the Java world, really appreciated Mark! Rune-Server - For the tuts,snippets but also the great community. Alexander(XxNinjaxX) - Good friend and helped me with models and interfaces. Myself - Getting everything done Eclipse & Purplez - Fixing the Coins bug while trading. Jason - Snippets i used of him and the help he gave me. Taurus - Good friend and always ready to help me a hand!

item.description:
@yvesdv wrote:

Divine Syndicate 2.0 is loading…
java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\Yves\DivineSyndicate\Maps\mapConfig.txt
(Het systeem kan het opgegeven pad niet vinden)
at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source)
at java.io.FileReader.(Unknown Source)
at client.setNewMaps(client.java:110)
at client.startUp(client.java:9038)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
at client.run(client.java:6087)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(Unknown Source)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(Unknown Source)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(Unknown Source)
at Update.unZipFile(Update.java:53)
at Update.(Update.java:29)
at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4773)
at client.startUp(client.java:9047)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
at client.run(client.java:6087)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
when i run the client i get this error, how do i fix it

item.title: [317] Divine Syndicate V2 | Finished Release | ErasedPkz | Quests | Pking | Skil
item.dc:creator: @remcowp remcowp
item.description:
@remcowp wrote:

[size=14pt]To see pictures etc check out:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


Few things has changed example: Barrow models has been replaced to the old models because people didnt like it.
[/size]

I have promised some people to get a v2 with the most bugs fixed and then re-release with them fixed and some new cool features.
So here is a list i have made of the things i had fixed:

Server Progession:

  • New Commmands: kdr/killratio/Tempmod/Tempadmin/Tempban/Tempmute/Checkbank/Relooaddrops/Reloadnpc/Reloaditems/Reloadshops
  • Empty in wilderness has been disabled
  • Made my own Configuration(Client) & Commands Class (Server)
  • Made my own MysteryBox with an 2 int array - Thanks to the help on Rune-Server.org!
  • Cannot trade in Wilderness anymore.
  • Added a Anti-spam system 7 > Is warning 9 = Muted.
  • Finished the Quest Tab WITH clickingbuttons added to it, Shouting Kdr etc.
  • Fixed Bones on Altar > Gives more Experience than Burying + Bones on Altar is using now the right Gfx & Animation.
  • Added a command ::price (itemid) (newprice) - This changes the shop price of the item. Thanks to Jason <3
  • Added RuneScape Fading, thanks to a Rune-Server snippet idk wich one anymore.
  • I made so you can “Transform” your Sacred Clay armour if not wearing it to Mage, Range or Melee Armour.
  • Completed the real RuneScape dagganoths cave (Water Birth Island) To enter cave to Dagganoths. Thanks to Rune-Server<3
  • All Homes Added Shops
  • Edited Majority of home shops (still need to do the rest)
  • Clipped following has been added succesfully!
  • Warriors guild now drops defenders, Dragon defender has been added to!
  • Fixed the clan chat bug that when u log out and log back in and join the chat your account is double.
  • Clan chat text has been edited, its now like it supposed to be
  • New shops: Donator=Party Pete(Npcid: 659)(Shopid: 26) & Vote Points=(27).
  • sendOption3 in dialogueHandler is now sucesfully working!
  • Npc made for Vote Handling(npcId: 807). He opens the shop, exchange vote for donatorPoint(1:5) or opens the vote page!
  • Finished the quest “The sleepless Dwarf”.
  • Made a better attack distance for Npc’s like real RS followed this little snippet: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/507268-better-attack-distance-like-rs-npcs.html
  • Run/Sprint orb in the client has been fixed.
  • Added Slayer points + made Duradel(npcId: 8275) Tradable, opens(shopId 48), the slayer shop.
  • Pvp artefacts created, also it randomly drops an artefact if you kill someone.
  • 1Million Coins to reset any stats at the (npcId 6138) 2.5Million Coins for Reset All Stats. - Donators are free.
  • PkPoint shop has been added(npcId: 8762). Has a first and second shop.
  • Tokkul shops has been created, accepting Tokkul instead of Coins/Gp & Items has been added.
  • Experience Lamp has been added, new interface stolen from Deathlypvpz.(itemId: 2528)
  • Experience lamp is fully working, no bugs, no spam clicking.(itemId: 2528)
  • Experience lamp: Every other Experience rate is getting diffrent exp From Easy to Impossible: 2.5, 2, 1.5, 1
  • Special Restores has been made, if in wild it gives only 25% special if not in wild it gives 50%. DONATORS ONLY!
  • Fixed the point shops, i forgot to add them to the method: handleOtherShops… Im so stupid, found out myself later.
  • FINALLY Fixed the Tokkul shops, fully working now.
  • Added Npc Get Block animation Method, Was not added into server. Fixing all Npc animations percise. But getting t2 errors when Character blocks - Client side
  • Added alot Npc Attack & Block models. Still need to add more because Jad is crashing the client sometimes.
  • RFD Minigame Has been finished.
  • Fixed 2 Dupes, thanks to the Rsps Community & Rune-Server!
  • Trading has been fixed > When trading coins and click on Trade 5 it doesnt dissapear from your inventory anymore.
  • My own Loyalty System has been added: [Mod], [Admin], [$], [$$] & [$$$]
  • If you buy an item from the store and sell back again u get only get 75% of the price u bought it for, thanks to Rune-Server community<3
  • Added New And Advances Frost Dragon Area - Should add a Npc shop for it just a thought. Portal Also Requires 80+ Dung to enter
  • Added Spawns: Port Sarim, Ice Dungeon, Lumbridge Swamp, Varrock Sewer & Correct Duel Spawns.
  • New CommandsLog system, Making diffrent txt files for Staffs, Donators & Players.
  • Using Magic Potion(1/4) on a Amulet of Glory will make the Amulet of Glory to a (1/4) and you will be able to teleport.

Client Progress:

  • Client: Dungeoneering whas in the skill spot of Hunter. Fixed the sprites + text.
  • Client: Not everyone likes the bright items so i have put them back to original.
  • Added Npc Get Block animation Method, Was not added into server. Fixing all Npc animations percise. But getting t2 errors when Character blocks - Client side

Still to add:

Bugs found by people who use Divine Syndicate source:

1- slayer tower
i went to slayer, and when i got there. i went up the chain. but it clicked it twice. and when it did. it sent me to top floor. instead of second floor.

2- clue scroll
Some of the clue scrolls. As you open them, it just shows teleport places. Completely covers whole clue. - DELETE THE CLUE SCROLLS LATER

3- zombie invasion
As i was doing the quest. i did everything. but when i started killing the Zombie champion. i noticed, the way he moves seems glitched. 
also the place where he is. im not sure if its suppose to be all black, but it was black and all i could see were where doors were at and then zombie cha

  • The cave of the Frost dragons, delete them and add Ice Giants and Alex makes a cave for the Frost Dragons.

  • Make diffrent Experience for Killing npcs etc.

  • Make it if you buy items from a store ex: Home teletab for (1kGP) and if you wanna sell it back u get only 75% of the amount u bought it for.

  • Make Staff of Light special + special bar. Already tryed to add it but for some reason it doesnt show…

  • Make the Flasks mixing to (6)…HOW THE **** WOULD I DO THAT WITHOUT GETTING PROBLEMS WITH THE OLD POTS??

  • Make so your account doesnt log out directly but after 10 seconds of clicking “Log Out”

  • Make Overload & Extrmee Potions Noted

  • Fix Combat(40$)??? - Gabbe on skype

  • Increase the server stability (15$)??? - James on skype

  • Add and Re edit Npc Emotes Attack/Block/Death Etc…

  • Tweak and fix Prices and Global Drops

  • Need to fix Jad Animations- Crashing client
    [/spoiler]

Thanks to everyone that have reported bugs & helped me to fix them, i really like the Rune-Server community and i have alot of respect for everyone here.
I know this wont be the best release here on Rune-Server but its just that im giving this out of respect and i allow everyone to use this and re-release it.
Have alot of fun using this and there wont be a v3 guys, this is the real end for me now ^^.

I have decided to make a package now because its just easyer ^^.
Package: http://uppit.com/balk67zaof0a/Divine_Syndicatev2.zip

Credits:
ErasedPkz - The base i used for this.
InsidiaX - For the combat, Pk Skill & Some other things.
Deathlypvpz - For the FunPK Location and a interface i forgot wich one.
Mark (Paradox)- A Friend that helped me out alot and gave me tips and really spend time on me to get me more in the Java world, really appreciated Mark!
Rune-Server - For the tuts,snippets but also the great community.
Alexander(XxNinjaxX) - Good friend and helped me with models and interfaces.
Myself - Getting everything done
Eclipse & Purplez - Fixing the Coins bug while trading.
Jason - Snippets i used of him and the help he gave me.
Taurus - Good friend and always ready to help me a hand!

Read full topic
item.source: [317] Divine Syndicate V2 | Finished Release | ErasedPkz | Quests | Pking | Skil
